channel.title: Black Mesa
channel.description:
Anyone playing? How do you guys find it? I haven't played HL1 since it was before my time as a gamer. Having played HL2, I fucking love Black Mesa.
Also, since when was the Other Games section moved to moparscape? Is the admin killing the forums on purpose?

http://moparscapeisthebest.com/
[/quote]
gay[/quote]Totally.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Radeon, post:5, topic:460601”][quote author=Phillipé link=topic=563535.msg4106656#msg4106656 date=1348071561]
Taharok is the one who’s moved our none programming and cheating related boards to moparscape, apparently it’s the future! (It is now they’re giving it all our boards, soon enough we’ll just have general discussion).

Black Mesa sucks on topic btw
[/quote]

Anyone playing? How do you guys find it? I haven’t played HL1 since it was before my time as a gamer. Having played HL2, I fucking love Black Mesa.

Also, since when was the Other Games section moved to moparscape? Is the admin killing the forums on purpose?

rather than moving general discussion boards here, they’re moving it over there

Wtf Why would they do that?[/quote]
because he secretly wants this side to die. i suggested that mscp should just be private server related and all general stuff would go here… but that didn’t work out.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Radeon, post:5, topic:460601”][quote author=Phillipé link=topic=563535.msg4106656#msg4106656 date=1348071561]
Taharok is the one who’s moved our none programming and cheating related boards to moparscape, apparently it’s the future! (It is now they’re giving it all our boards, soon enough we’ll just have general discussion).

Black Mesa sucks on topic btw
[/quote]

Anyone playing? How do you guys find it? I haven’t played HL1 since it was before my time as a gamer. Having played HL2, I fucking love Black Mesa.

Also, since when was the Other Games section moved to moparscape? Is the admin killing the forums on purpose?

rather than moving general discussion boards here, they’re moving it over there

Wtf Why would they do that?

Wait, what the fuck is this thread about?

http://release.blackmesasource.com/

A source mod that recreates half-life 1 on the source engine. Free on steam if you own any source games gogogogogo[/quote]
Taharok supports MSCP’s “implied” independence.

Read full topic
